title: Anant Ambani, Murray Auchincloss inaugurate Jio-bpâ€™s 500th EV-charging station in Mumbai
description: Reliance Industries Limited and bp have inaugurated the 500th Jio-bp pulse EV-charging station at the Jio World Convention Centre in Mumbai. Jio-bp has expanded its network to 5,000 charging points in India, with 95% being fast-charging stations. The initiative aims to promote sustainable green mobility in India.
